channel.title: CBP Border Wait Times
channel.description: Estimated wait times for reaching the primary inspection booth, the first point of contact with CBP when crossing the Canada/U.S. and Mexico/U.S. land borders. Each border location updates its estimated wait times hourly.

item.title: Otay Mesa - Passenger
item.description:
Hours: 24 hrs/day
Date: 7/7/2024
Passenger Vehicles Maximum Lanes: 13
General Lanes: At 10:00 pm PDT 90 min delay 2 lane(s) open
Sentri Lanes: At 10:00 pm PDT 15 min delay 1 lane(s) open
Ready Lanes: At 10:00 pm PDT 90 min delay 5 lane(s) open
Border Notice: Entrance to Ready Lanes is on the far left as you approach the border. Go to www.getyouhome.gov for more information
Go to www.GetYouHome.gov for more information.

item.title: San Ysidro
item.description:
Hours: 24 hrs/day
Date: 7/7/2024
Passenger Vehicles Maximum Lanes: 34
General Lanes: At 5:00 pm PDT 220 min delay 7 lane(s) open
Sentri Lanes: At 5:00 pm PDT 15 min delay 9 lane(s) open
Ready Lanes: At 5:00 pm PDT 145 min delay 15 lane(s) open
